Source.Name: ffmpeg-chromium
Source.Summary: Chromium's ffmpeg for Chromium based browsers
Source.Description: Chromium's ffmpeg for Chromium based browsers such as Opera and Vivaldi with support for proprietary codecs such as H.264 enabled.

Package.Name: ffmpeg-chromium
Package.Summary: Chromium's ffmpeg for Chromium based browsers
Package.Description: Chromium's ffmpeg for Chromium based browsers such as Opera and Vivaldi with support for proprietary codecs such as H.264 enabled.
